docs.snippet: Before he was indicted last May, former House Speaker Dennis Hastert was known primarily for rising from political obscurity in rural Illinois to the nation's third-highest office, which he occupied for eight years. Some key events in Hastert's life...
docs.lead_paragraph: Before he was indicted last May, former House Speaker Dennis Hastert was known primarily for rising from political obscurity in rural Illinois to the nation's third-highest office, which he occupied for eight years. Some key events in Hastert's life and career and the criminal case against him:

headline.main: Timeline of Events in Dennis Hastert's Life and Career
headline.print_headline: Timeline of Events in Dennis Hastert's Life and Career

docs.snippet: Shortly after last November’s attacks on Paris by a Brussels-based Islamic State cell, a top U.S. counter-terrorism official traveling in Europe wanted to visit Brussels to learn more about the investigation.
docs.lead_paragraph: Shortly after last November’s attacks on Paris by a Brussels-based Islamic State cell, a top U.S. counter-terrorism official traveling in Europe wanted to visit Brussels to learn more about the investigation.

headline.main: U.S. Frustration Simmers Over Belgium's Struggle With Militant Threat
headline.print_headline: U.S. Frustration Simmers Over Belgium's Struggle With Militant Threat

docs.snippet: Yum Brands Inc, owner of KFC and Pizza Hut, is in talks with private equity firms including KKR & Co LP and Hopu Investments to sell a minority stake in its China operations as it prepares to spin off the once booming unit, two sources familiar...
docs.lead_paragraph: Yum Brands Inc, owner of KFC and Pizza Hut, is in talks with private equity firms including KKR & Co LP and Hopu Investments to sell a minority stake in its China operations as it prepares to spin off the once booming unit, two sources familiar with the plans said on Thursday.

headline.main: Yum in Talks With KKR, Hopu, to Sell Stake in China Unit: Sources
headline.print_headline: Yum in Talks With KKR, Hopu, to Sell Stake in China Unit: Sources

docs.snippet: Yum Brands Inc, owner of KFC and Pizza Hut, is in talks with private equity firms including KKR & Co LP and Hopu Investments to sell a minority stake in its China operations as it prepares to spin off the once booming unit, two sources familiar...
docs.lead_paragraph: Yum Brands Inc, owner of KFC and Pizza Hut, is in talks with private equity firms including KKR & Co LP and Hopu Investments to sell a minority stake in its China operations as it prepares to spin off the once booming unit, two sources familiar with the plans said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: “You Are What You Wear,” by the show’s lyricist Duncan Sheik, is full of tongue-in-cheek references to that era’s clothes and food trends.
docs.lead_paragraph: “You Are What You Wear,” by the show’s lyricist Duncan Sheik, is full of tongue-in-cheek references to that era’s clothes and food trends.

headline.main: A Gleeful Ode to Late-’80s Fashion, From the New ‘American Psycho’ Musical

docs.snippet: Focused Technologies, hired by the state to digitize fingerprint records and other confidential material, has agreed to pay a $3.1 million settlement after illegally outsourcing the work to India.
docs.lead_paragraph: Focused Technologies, hired by the state to digitize fingerprint records and other confidential material, has agreed to pay a $3.1 million settlement after illegally outsourcing the work to India.
docs.abstract: New York State Inspector Gen Catherine Leahy Scott announces Focused Technologies Imaging Services has put in jeopardy privacy of around 16 million people by outsourcing, to India, $3.45 million state contract to digitize personal information, including fingerprints, of 22 million people; Focused Technologies has agreed to pay $3.1 million in penalties and fees.

headline.main: New York State Contractor Is Said to Threaten Privacy of Millions With Outsourcing
headline.print_headline: Outsourcing by Contractor Is Said to Pose Privacy Risk

docs.snippet: Rodriguez told ESPN on Wednesday that he would retire at the end his current 10-year deal with the Yankees.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rodriguez told ESPN on Wednesday that he would retire at the end his current 10-year deal with the Yankees.

headline.main: Alex Rodriguez Says He Will Retire After 2017 Season

docs.snippet: An independent task force charged with investigating the city’s tainted water also laid part of the blame on environmental racism.
docs.lead_paragraph: An independent task force charged with investigating the city’s tainted water also laid part of the blame on environmental racism.
docs.abstract: Independent panel appointed by Michigan Gov Rick Snyder releases report on Flint water crisis that finds lack of regard for concerns of poor and minority residents of city played part in delayed response by government to complaints about water; report blames government employees at every level for failure to address water problems, but it emphasizes particular role played by state employees.

headline.main: Flint Water Crisis Inquiry Finds State Ignored Warning Signs

docs.snippet: Hotchkiss banned marijuana shops after the state legalized the drug in 2012. But now it is weighing replacing its lost coal earnings with marijuana money.
docs.lead_paragraph: Hotchkiss banned marijuana shops after the state legalized the drug in 2012. But now it is weighing replacing its lost coal earnings with marijuana money.
docs.abstract: Hotchkiss, Colo, which voted to ban recreational marijuana, will vote in April on whether to reverse prohibition in bid to bring new economic activity to town after collapse of its coal industry.

headline.main: As Coal Prospects Decline, a Colorado Town Reconsiders Marijuana
headline.print_headline: As Coal Declines, Colorado Town Reconsiders Marijuana

docs.snippet: Fetish wear has infiltrated the runways and woven itself inextricably into the fabric of fashion.
docs.lead_paragraph: Fetish wear has infiltrated the runways and woven itself inextricably into the fabric of fashion.
docs.abstract: Fetish wear in array of leather, latex and vinyl has made its way into fashion, as once edgy look has been subsumed into mainstream.

headline.main: Raiding the Sex Shop for the Latest Fashion
headline.print_headline: Raiding the Sex Shop, Eyes Wide Open
